# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

def wrap_string(text: String)
  words = text.split(" ")
  lines = []
  i = 0
  while i < words.length do
    line = words[i]
    j = 1
    while (j <= 10 && !line.empty? || i + j >= words.length) do
      next_word = words[i+j] if i+j < words.length
      line << " " << next_word if next_word
      j += 1
    end
    lines << line if !line.empty?
    i = j
  end
  return "\n".join(lines)
end

Example:
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines") #=> "This\nfunction\will\nwrap\nwords\into\nlines"
